fix for this NPE has already been committed under bug 151845
Hard to find a road map for AspectJ. Do you know when (or have any idea of when) it and especially a new version of AJDT will be out that fixes this issue?

closing as duplicate of 151845.

the AspectJ fix will make it into a development build of AJDT 1.4.1 for Eclipse 3.2 within a week or so. The AJDT 1.4.1 release is then planned for around October, as per the plans page: http://www.eclipse.org/ajdt/plans.php

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 151845 ***

The fix has been made in bug #151845. Would it be possible to do a new development release today? I cannot use AJDT due to this bug since I have a window popping up every 5-10 seconds. I guess that this bug together with #146071 is not the best of combinations :)

The version of AspectJ in AJDT should have been updated by now, but there is a delay due to a problem caused by other changes going in to AspectJ. This will be fixed ASAP, and there should then be a new dev build by tomorrow. Sorry for the disruption (we are also working on a major restructuring to improve the whole updating AspectJ into AJDT process).

If you could attach a standalone test project to bug 146071 that would be a great help.
I am currently unable to use AJDT since it basically causes my Eclipse to barely respond to user interaction, but as soon as the new dev version is out I'll dig into bug 146071 again.
Fair enough, although have you tried reverting to an earlier version of AJDT to see if the problem goes away? (Or it might be due to a particular project configuration)
